full_text:
Page 1658
>> (b)(6): (b)(7)(C) @gmail.com> 12/5/2019 12:24 PM >>>
Hi (b)(6): (b)(7)(C),
I'm not sure if you've already relocated but I'm hoping you can help or redirect me to someone who can. I have a private investigator we have appointed under CJA coming to visit our client from out of town next week Monday and Tuesday. What do we need to do to get him permission to come in with us for a legal visit? Thank you.
Sent from my iPhone
<Sponsoring Attorney form.pdf>

text_blocks.content: I'm not sure if you've already relocated but I'm hoping you can help or redirect me to someone who can. I have a private investigator we have appointed under CJA coming to visit our client from out of town next week Monday and Tuesday. What do we need to do to get him permission to come in with us for a legal visit? Thank you.

additional_notes: The document appears to be an email with a redacted sender and recipient name. The email discusses a private investigator visiting a client and requests assistance in obtaining permission for the visit.
